website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable and safe booster that can attach to the seat and offers some nice added features.
pros: Includes clips to attach booster to the seat
Has a cup holder and a hide away drawer the kids love
Back can be removed as your child grows
A good choice for taller children
It sits low to the seat, making it easier for little kids to get in and out of the seat themselves
cons: The padding on this seat is not very thick

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: we had the evenflo high back booster, but the seat belt was always slipping out and it was ackward to carry. Decided to go back to the good old graco brand, was not disappointed! Seatbelt stays easily in, I like how it has the clip to the seat options, and the pull out for snacks. My kid says its pretty comfortable as well. Also the back that attaches can be separated to use as a seat booster only in a couple years
customer_reviews.author: mkiiii

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous getting a booster from a 5 point harness because my daughter is small and barely over 30 pounds, but she is 4 and was ready. This seat latches, which is a great security point for me and has a shoulder strap adjustment piece so the shoulder belt positions correctly. My daughter loves this seat and loves having the "secret drawer" to put her sunglasses in.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Huner

customer_reviews.title: it works my son is comfortable in it
customer_reviews.text: Decent seat for the price. it works my son is comfortable in it. Only thing I dislike is I feel like I get the seat installed nice and tight but the straps you pull to tighten and loosen the LATCH do not stay put like my britax seat. but for a second back up seat I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Cupholder is hidden in the base!!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought the cupholder was missing since I did not see it in a bag etc. I was a little irritated because I have seen comments about it. But while putting the booster seat together, I had to turn the base around and there it was! It is secured inside the base, which pops right out for you to put it in its right place. I hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Booster with LATCH system!
customer_reviews.text: When I got to the stage of needing to graduate my daughter to a booster seat, I was very adamant about having a latch system--having a just a chair sitting on the seat made me nervous. I was very happy to discover this booster seat that has TWO latches at the back and the seat back with some head protection. And considering other reviews of this product in which people were involved in accidents (glad they are okay!) and the chair really proved itself, I was sold. My daughter is really proud of her chair, and we've purchased a second for our other vehicle as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Seatbelt slips from seatbelt guide
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 5 year old daughter, she is about 40 inches tall and approximately 38 pounds. The seat is sturdy and stays in place. My daughter enjoys having the cup holder and the snack compartment, which her previous seat did not have. The only issue I have with the product is that in the position the head rest needs to be set at for my daughters height, the seatbelt does not stay with in the guide track allowing my daughter to lean forward from the seat which is not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chasse

customer_reviews.title: Booster sit with added support!
customer_reviews.text: I like this style booster seat better than the other booster seats that don't have the back to it. It feels more supportive and secure. I also love that it has the latch system which I've never seen another booster seat with it. It's also easy to put together and install. The only thing I thought it had was the harnest straps but it doesn't (hence booster seat, I guess). All in all I would buy it again if I needed to, its a way better option for me than the other typical style booster seats.
customer_reviews.author: Beautifully Warm

customer_reviews.title: Really like the tethers.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to these from the regular turbo booster because it has the tethers to keep the seat in place when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Joby619

customer_reviews.title: Growing too fast
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace a regular car seat since my son finally hit the mark where we couldn't loosen up his straps any further on his car seat. I didn't realize I had to put it together but even having to do so at the last minute before heading out, it only took 5-10 minutes and all snapped together as instructed. It feels like a good quality item and I expect to get many years worth of use out of it between my son and his little sister, once she graduates to it. I would recommend, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: iamroberson

customer_reviews.title: Great high back booster
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. Easy to put together & takes up much less space than the forever carseat we had. The only reason I’m not giving it 5 stars is that I didn’t realize the main difference between the LX & regular is just the Latch system. You don’t really need Latch with a booster seat because it uses a seatbelt, so I feel like I paid extra for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Tastycakes

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to install in the car
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son's 5th birthday. He was getting uncomfortable in his other car seat (Graco MyRide65), especially on our out of town trips. It was super easy to install in the car. The material is soft and comfy for his body. He loves the tray that folds into the seat (he treats it like a secret compartment for his sunglasses or small toys). Great product for parents and kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Benavides

customer_reviews.title: The cupholder is stowed away underneath the booster seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice and sturdy booster seat. I really like the black and silver cover. I noticed another reviews that people thought they were missing the cupholder. It is actually stowed away underneath the booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat, IMO
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these. Two for my daughter and two for my son. That is, one for each child in each of our cars. They are great. Comfortable and safe. Need I say more? The kids love their seats, the wife and I love the safety they provide, and they also convert to boosters for when they get older. In my opinion these are the best seats to buy, especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: jieselDeep

customer_reviews.title: We own 3
customer_reviews.text: Recently transitioned my son into this booster. It has great reviews and safety features. The latch system is extremely easy to use and he loves the cup holder
customer_reviews.author: Jcraze0114

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and install. The latch system makes it more secure than a standard booster. Easier to use than most latch systems. My son loves the cup holder. The seat is not very padded though.
customer_reviews.author: Em Brodie

customer_reviews.title: Great Update!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift "to me" for my 4 yr old granddaughter!! I hated the double shoulder harness carseat, with winter coats here in cold PA, so I bought this one to make her a "Big Girl"!!! It's so easy now!! She loves it probably more than me 'cause she can unbuckle the seat belt all by her self when in the driveway!! Great purchase & well worth the money from Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: parliegirl

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and my daughter likes it. Very easy to adjust. The storage compartment is hard to get open and the back of the booster is not very sturdy. It does not feel very cushioned, but my child has not complained. I like that the shoulder belt is guided so it falls correctly into position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict85

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite seat
customer_reviews.text: We have had this booster now for a couple of months. It’s held up great. My daughter once fitted in to the seat good is now capable of buckling and unbuckling herself every time. The shoulder guide works great. She likes the comfort of this booster vs her old car seat. Looking forward to getting many years of use out of this. The cup holder and the extra storage spot belt out a lot on any drive.
customer_reviews.author: SunflowersN Bluebirds

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together and install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and install. Comfortable for the kiddos and they love the little side compartment to put their sunglasses. We bought 2 and super happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I like that it can anchor to the seat and feels more stable than other seats we’ve tried, but the straps always end up twisted and somehow the head rest ends up getting pushed down.
customer_reviews.author: Lori33

customer_reviews.title: These car seats have been great
customer_reviews.text: Tough. Lasted forever. Can’t wait for our kids to be old enough to ride like normal humans!!
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES F LUEDEMANN

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2. One defective. Happy with the other, as long as it continues to work properly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, just a few weeks ago. One is great, everything seems to work properly. So, I know I know how to adjust and lock parts into place. However, the other one, from day one of installation, the strap to tighten the seat into place, does not work. The seat still moves around, as if it wasn't latched, because the strap, for some reason doesn't grip. Then, I noticed, the same chair's head piece does not stay locked into place. When I adjusted it for my child's height, it just falls back down.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Car seat
customer_reviews.text: Backing was a bit flimsy. Built with so sort of a plastic that’s a bit to flexible then I anticipated. I think it will still do the job if it came down to it. Easy to remove and take off which is it’s best feature. The car seat belt does get pulled off it’s loop on the chair all the time.
customer_reviews.author: CRS

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Having outgrown the car seat, my grandson needed the next stage for car comfort and protection. I am happy to report that this fit the bill. It is easy to install in the car, he fits in it comfortably, and he likes it. What more it there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Edward Gronet

customer_reviews.title: would love to give this zero stars.
customer_reviews.text: the system where it holds the shoulder belt to the car seat is just terrible, it continuously twists and binds the car belt and worse yet, the belt is showing extreme wear after only a year of use. almost anything would be better than this.
customer_reviews.author: spenny

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Monitor return window for failing clip tensioner.
customer_reviews.text: Good car seat. Love the clips at the bottom of the seat to hold it in place. BUT the device that holds the clips with tension failed after 4 months and now the seat sways left and right through turns.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Just What I needed
customer_reviews.text: It’s not an extreme amount of padding but my daughter says it’s comfortable. Feels very safe. It holds the seatbelt in the perfect spot to go over my daughters shoulder. For the price I think it’s a pretty good deal
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 of these. Because they are affordable, I don't have to move one from vehicle to vehicle. My daughter loves it. It grows with her and is comfortable. My daughter is 6 and still using the back, but can be used without if preferred.
customer_reviews.author: sstumpe

customer_reviews.title: Call customer service if you have issues with assembly. They are very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: The booster seat overall is very nice. Just be aware that you have to assemble it which was a little bit of a challenge for me. It is easy to install and the kids seem comfortable in them. Also the cup holder is stored UNDER the SEAT for shipping so it took me a while to figure that out. Greco customer service is very helpful with installation questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with great cup holder
customer_reviews.text: This is simply a great seat with an above average cup holder that actually holds drinks. So many seats have shallow cup holders or ones that secure the drink with an elastic band. They all tend to not actually secure drinks. This one has a deep, solid cup holder. Installation was very simple and my kids says it’s much more comfortable than his last seat.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable seat and not bulky at all
customer_reviews.text: This seat looks great and very sleek in my car. It latches to the car so it’s not moving around when you’re driving with it unoccupied, and also makes it easier for my son to buckle himself. My son loves this seat and was very excited about the cup holders and the arm rests. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: D_K_O

customer_reviews.title: Recieved used product parts missing buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Returned product or used product received. Product arrived in a non graco box with only non English instructions. Also belt positioning clip was not present. Waiting to hear from Graco Customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond perfect! My kids love sitting in them. I feel good that they are comfortable and of course safe! And they feel happy... The little pull out storage container is a little bit difficult to open, but other than that it's perfect. I bought 4 in total!
customer_reviews.author: Sheba

customer_reviews.title: Good booster
customer_reviews.text: This booster is easy to put together. It is adjustable for height and can be used backless once your child is big enough. There is a cup holder on one side and a little storage cubby on the other. It has anchors to anchor into your vehicle as well, which I really appreciated. My kids were excited to finally be free of their five point restraints and seem to enjoy these seats as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Sydik

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my kids!!! They love them, and they were super easy to install. They're really sturdy and I feel like out of all the carseats we've looked at, these are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a week ago for my 6 year old. Goes together and installs easily. She loves it, I love it. Her only problem is she can’t find a comfortable position to nap in as it sits straight up and down, unlike the incline in her car seat....but that’s part of growing up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for safety
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together and install. The adjustable back (for height) is incredibly easy to use and there are clear directions on the seat for placement. My son is 46" and 66lbs and he fits perfectly in the seat (with room to grow). The guide for the seatbelt makes it safe for him to use. It comes with a guide to use with the booster by itself as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy quail

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I like that you can buckle the seat (base) in place unlike many other car seats. The latch helps keep it from moving around in the back. The cup holder is perfect and overall we really liked upgrading to this model.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this booster, we own several colors for several cars, but this particular one came without the cup holder! As the most used feature by my son, I am terribly disappointed. When a safety device leaves off a feature, even a convenience feature, it makes me question the integrity of the entire the device. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and install!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together and very easy to install in the car. Unlike a child safety seat, this thing is lightweight and the covers are easy to take off and wash. Wish I had transitioned my toddler sooner. Great price for a brand I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this booster seat for our four year old. I like that it is anchored to the car's seat rather than just sitting on it. It is light weight which makes changing cars easy.
customer_reviews.author: Steady Life

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves her new seat. Took a few days to get used to but now she loves it and it fits great. LOVE the quick release anchors so easy to use and put in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Wildberry

customer_reviews.title: Growing girl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5yr old niece. Installed in my Ford Escape with no problems. She really likes the seat. Cup holder and snack holder was a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Babb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter really likes it, and it is super easy to install. The pull out beverage an storage drawer is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: J. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's first big girl seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat for my daughter. This seat fits perfectly in our cars and my daughter is comfortable for long car rides. Easy to install and have had no trouble with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on more expensive boosters!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! We were looking to switch our son to a booster for a while now. We looked at all the expensive boosters like the Britax and others. This one is perfect, sturdy, and my son says it "feels Great." I will be ordering another shortly!
customer_reviews.author: David A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this seat twice
customer_reviews.text: Installed quickly in our suv. Our grand-daughter says that it is more comfortable than her previous car seat. I bought one for our suv and then bought a second one for my son’s vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This fits skinny kids
customer_reviews.text: My son is only 5 and hardly has room for his bum. It is narrow. That is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Tara in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great booster! My son says it's comfy, which it does feel that way. I like that it does have the clips to anchor into the seat like other carseats do. Easy to put together. Instructions were clear and easy to understand. I will be purchasing another when my daughter is ready to transition.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect car seats for my 4 and 5 year old. We fit two of these plus a Graco 4ever seat all in the same row of our traverse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old and he loves it. He feels so independent now that he can use a seatbelt. He says its comfortable and it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The grands love them. However, we are older and one of them was not so easy to install in the vehicle. However, once installed they work great
customer_reviews.author: Roberta D

customer_reviews.title: The tot feels like a super big boy now that he's graduated to ...
customer_reviews.text: The tot feels like a super big boy now that he's graduated to a seat belt booster. This was super easy to install and the front adjuster for the latch system is an excellent design choice.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle4040

customer_reviews.title: Safe Seat.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, safe, good price, made well, will last until my grandchildren are ready to sit in a regular seat.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great buy overall. My son loves it. Easy to assemble. Easy to install. Easy to clean fabric because my boys know how to make a mess
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Vera

customer_reviews.title: Great multi use high back & booster.
customer_reviews.text: We really like how it is both booster and high back with anchor straps.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and safe
customer_reviews.text: Its comfy, adjustable, can be safely fastened. Our kid likes it and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Removable high-back makes this booster seat a great option for everyday use and when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Rthill

customer_reviews.title: She likes it?
customer_reviews.text: Our #meanbaby likes this seat. She says it’s comfy and falls sleep regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dependable product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, durable car seat which will convert to a booster when needed. This is the third one of these I have purchased. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: heffk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 4 year old. Sturdy and easy to install. For the price, ideal purchase
customer_reviews.author: MMom

customer_reviews.title: Love the LATCH system straps!
customer_reviews.text: We love that it works with the LATCH system because we didn't want my son to be moving the booster around while climbing in. He says it's comfortable. He likes the hidden drawer for his treasures.
customer_reviews.author: MimiB

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: The boy had to ride in it for a 14 hour trip and he didn’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: It’s a car seat
customer_reviews.text: Why can’t they just put the tie down strap thingymagigers that clip on like a seatbelt, instead of the ones you have to hook?
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter really enjoyed riding in it on a long trip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy... but
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchildren have been impressed, TWO cup holders! But good grief, this thing is a chore to get in/out. It’s best to set and forget.
customer_reviews.author: P. D. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, and super easy to install/uninstall
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, easy to install, and comfy for the little ones! Cup holder, and snack tray is a huge benefit, and makes snacking while driving easier for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: My nice loved it. Light weight. Easy to install. Sturdy. Hope it lasts long.
customer_reviews.author: Zuly

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought 2 of these. They are so lightweight and easy to use and I love the latch system!! This was a must have for us for safety!
customer_reviews.author: Girlegrl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight; easy to put together and install
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new “big girl” seat and so do I. It was very easy to put together. It came in 3 pieces; the seat bottom, the back piece, and the arm rests. The installation into the car was simple as well using the safety hooks in the back to attach to the mounts in the car. Its very light weight for moving into other vehicles and doesn’t take up a lot of extra space like the bigger car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Stains easy
customer_reviews.text: Omg this car seat good filthy the day I put it in my car. Definitely not good given that it stains quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Seat doesn't move
customer_reviews.text: Love the seat it's perfect only down side is when moving the shoulder strap across it likes to come out of the upper area so you have to feed it back in. But small price to pay for being able to secure the seat so when he climbs in it doesn't move at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super light weight
customer_reviews.text: easy in and out no-hassle installation in the car and no hassle child buckle in. We have used this in a car, SUV, and truck all with the same ease.
customer_reviews.author: karen greathouse

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and was easy to install and remove when needed
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who is 5 says it is comfortable and I have to help buckle her in but she can out of it in a flash
customer_reviews.author: TellenE

customer_reviews.title: Good Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Reasonable cost. Grand daughter loves the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great seat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these seats (have two now), easy to install with clips (to hold in place). Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Carson P. Klemp

customer_reviews.title: This is a great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great booster seat .. We got it for our 4.5 year old grandson so there is no switching back and forth with carseats for Mom and Dad when we grab him for play days !
customer_reviews.author: Kris K

customer_reviews.title: 4 yr old and 70 pounds, not a fat guy, Simply Hugh.  Dad is 6'5" Mom is 5'10"
customer_reviews.text: Grandson is very comfortable in this seat. With a person his size this is very important. We have two booster seats and a car seat. It is difficult to get the seat belt fastened.
customer_reviews.author: Brat

customer_reviews.title: terrible across the board
customer_reviews.text: absolutely terrible. AND - once i got it together i couldn't get it in the car. NOW i can't get it apart to fit it back in the box to return it!!!! so have to keep a 70$ pile of plastic. and STILL BUY A NEW ONE. Will go to target and buy it in person.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Santa of booster seats
customer_reviews.text: Random kids will sit in these. If Santa was a booster seat he would be this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nothing not to like.
customer_reviews.text: Children love the cup holder and “secret compartment” (pull out tray” where we put fruit snacks for them to find. They say they are “Weally comfortable PopPop”.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Jones

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: 3rd one I have purchased for various kids and vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: AZN Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: The placement of the shoulder strap was perfect due to the design. I feel safe putting my 5-year old, 40# girl in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Reese

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is easy to install, and anchors to the car seat. Seems safe and my grandson says it's very comfortable. I would definitely recommend this booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loved this booster seat so much I bought a second one for my other vehicle
customer_reviews.author: Cassaundra Rathbone

customer_reviews.title: Keep kids safe.
customer_reviews.text: It is a car seat, does the job as it should. Surprised it doesn’t have a rear restraint strap.
customer_reviews.author: Toyman

customer_reviews.title: Love this "big kid" carseat!
customer_reviews.text: So great!!!!!! Perfect for transitioning into booster. I like the seat belt clip holder at the top
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and exactly what I was looking for. Easy to move from vehicle to vehicle and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz J.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Easy to isttll and perfect for my 6 yr old
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I think it is hard to beat this seat. I have 2 of them. No brainer with this one. It is not as big and bulky as others we have used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed! Not very reliable
customer_reviews.text: The seat is little cheap and not made from a durable material. Bit disappointed with the material and the price they charged.
customer_reviews.author: amit dubey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love this car seat. We wanted something that was thin and easy to fit in my husbands truck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, arrives quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product when the time comes to transition to a big kid seat.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. I always like Graco and I’m happy with the ease of installation. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Layton

customer_reviews.title: Mom and kid approved
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to switch cars. Not cumbersome to handle and there’s no more fighting with straps that need to be pulled just right. My daughter loves her big girl seat.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up and I really like the LATCH install
customer_reviews.text: This is super lightweight, very slim, and extremely easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: JLT

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my twins who are 6 recently. Love them so far! Super easy to install and they take up so much less room than their MyRide car seats! Headrests still hold their heads mostly in place. Overall very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kersh

customer_reviews.title: This is a great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great booster seat. It's lightweight, but still feels like it will protect your child. It doesn't take up anywhere near as much room in the seat as some of the really bulky ones. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: SAMSDoll

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice seat. It offers good protection, looks great and is very secure. Easy to assemble and install.
customer_reviews.author: dr11

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy
customer_reviews.text: My son HATES trips with this seat. Not comfy at all. Very flimsy also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Graco TurboBooster LX Highback Booster Seat with Latch System, Matrix
product_meta.description:
Color:Black/RedThe Graco TurboBooster LX Highback Booster Seat with Latch System helps safely transport your big kid from 40 to 100 lb* and up to 57 inches tall. This 2-in-1 seat converts from a highback to a backless booster as your big kid grows. It provides a secure connection to your vehicle seat with its one-hand, front-adjust Latch System, making self-buckling easier for your independent child. While the purpose of the Latch** in the Booster is to secure the booster to the vehicle seat while the booster is unoccupied and help facilitate independent buckling, you will secure your child in the booster seat with the vehicle lap/shoulder belt. The seat has an integrated cup holder and hideaway storage compartment to keep your child's drinks and favorite things within arm's reach. This seat is Graco ProtectPlus Engineered to help protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes. *To continue to meet industry standards, we have increased the weight minimum from 30 to 40 lb **Since the Latch system only secures the booster seat to the vehicle in this application and is not used for installation, it may be used regardless of the weight of the child (up to the maximum weight recommendation of the seat).

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Helps safely transport your big kid from 4 10 years old, from 40 100 lb* and up to 57 inches tall *To continue to meet industry standards, we have increased the weight minimum from 30 to 40 lb
One hand front adjust Latch system secures booster to vehicle seat
Secure connection keeps booster seat steady for easy self buckling for your independent child
Padded, height adjustable armrests for your child's comfort
Multi layer headrest for security and comfort; EPS, energy-absorbing foam for effective impact management
